text: Malumel is a locality in Thodiyoor Panchayat￼￼￼￼in the Karunagappally Taluk , Kollam district, Kerala, India. ==Geography== Pallikkalaar is a stream flowing through the village. ==Temples== There is a temple called the Malumel Bhagavathi Kshethram (temple). The idol is goddess Bhadrakali Deshadevatha of Malumel. ==Sports and games== The village has a vast playground in which there is a pipal tree and a banyan tree. Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Malumel
